name: Stormy (yariplus)
description:
Help apprentice weather wizard Stormy reach the goal.

A - Switch Spell
W - Wait a turn

Gust = Push monsters two blocks.
Sleet = Makes tiles icy.
Sun = Melts icy tiles.

Moving or using a spell uses a turn.
Changing direction or changing your spell doesn't use a turn.

Spells take one turn to recharge.

Enemies will move when counter reaches 0.
